You face the demon after it absorbs Garrett's life energy, but you have no fear. You're not fighting for the past. This is for the future.
The sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up some of the overflowing Karma.
Further within the sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up even more of the overflowing Karma.
A hidden domain in the sanctuary that watches over all living things. Now's your chance to get more Karma than you could ever imagine!
It is said this is where souls come to be forged. Here is your chance to gain experience as a Summoner as well as some Karma.
You are deep within the area where it's said souls come to be forged. Now's your chance to obtain lots of experience as a Summoner as well as Karma.
You're at the far end of the area where it's said souls come to be forged. Now's your chance to obtain heaps of experience as a Summoner and Karma.
A secret area where visitors are said to train their souls to the limit. You may just obtain more experience and Karma than you could ever imagine.
Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some Evolution Material Units!
Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some rare Evolution Material Units!
Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some super rare Evolution Material Units!
It is said that those with good taste hold lavish parties to display their favorite pots. It is rumored that these pots are also very rare evolution materials...
A dangerous cave full of traps to ensnare those who dare enter. Despite its dangers, many still venture after its treasures.
Further into the dangerous, trap-filled cave. Mountains of treasure or oceans of despair, who knows what awaits!
There are many secrets in this trap-filled cave. Do you fear getting trapped in despair, or are you hopeful to find riches!?
The Temple of Fire, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
The Temple of Water, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
The Temple of Earth, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
The Temple of Thunder, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
This temple is devoted to a god who's said to have the power to draw out one's ultimate power. The power to defeat gods awaits you deep within.
The Temple of Light, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
The Temple of Dark, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
A Fire pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
A Water pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
An Earth pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
A Thunder pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
A Light pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
A Dark pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
Heroes and spirits from all over gather among these dangerous ruins. Now's your chance to gather hordes of Material Units!
Deeper within the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to get some valuable Material Units!
The deepest reaches of the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to obtain some rare Material Units!
This hidden area is home to dangerous relics from heroes and warriors all over. Now's your chance to get these otherwise hard to get materials!
These sealed off ruins are home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to obtain some super rare materials!
This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters made of Zel, the currency of this world..
This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters packed full of Zel, the currency of this world.
This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters bursting full of Zel, the currency of this world.
Take part in this grand parade and capture some of these metal type monsters, bursting full of fusion experience!!
A grand procession featuring only Metal Units that are Super Rare and above! Metal Kings and above guaranteed, don't miss this great chance!
A grand procession featuring Fire Metal monsters with loads of Fire experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
A grand procession featuring Water Metal monsters with loads of Water experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
A grand procession featuring Earth Metal monsters with loads of Earth experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
A grand procession featuring Thunder Metal monsters with loads of Thunder experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
A grand procession featuring Light Metal monsters with loads of Light experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
A grand procession featuring Dark Metal monsters with loads of Dark experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
By popular demand, a celebration with only Metal Gods or stronger Units is here! It's a parade unlike you've never seen before!
A big parade of Jewel monsters full of Zel is coming your way! The hunt for riches is on!
Here comes a mystical parade full of high class jewel monsters. Now's your chance to get super rich with Kings and higher guaranteed!
Are the gods that capricious?! A parade where only Jewel Gods or stronger Units are found is finally here!
Strange creatures called Elgifs have been found in the Vortex. The curious glyphs written on their otherworldly tablets hide great powers within.
Elgifs are very rare creatures who seldom show themselves to humans. So if you spot one, it is a good omen of the things to come.
Only those blessed with luck can obtain the rarest of the tablets. However, the gods alone seem to know where the mysterious Elgifs dwell.
You who seek the luminous tablets, open the door if you have prepared your heart and mind. A trial unlike any you have faced before awaits.
These valuable tablets with their unusual powers are not easily obtained. Only those with immense power and rare luck are granted a chance at them.
Only those who are prepared to die may proceed. Unfathomable despair and the ultimate power granted only to the chosen one await you.
A traveler on the first steps of her journey. Her inexperience clouds her ability to see the value in friendship.
A traveler who has come to be known throughout the land. She's realized the value of having someone to train with.
A valiant traveler who commands praise wherever she goes. She continues her journey, always on the look out for worthy allies.
A celebrated traveler who is almost unmatched in her swordsmanship. Her skills had brought her to be able to match herself to fight against the gods' invasion.
Living among the shadows, his pride as a ninja warrants him little contact with others. Few are harder to pin down than he.
Acting under the cover of night, there's no objective he can't achieve. Who knows what it'd take to capture such a man.
Enveloped in a burning red darkness, only the strongest could even stir this man, whose training has cleansed him of all desire.
A man whose soul that is one with the darkness and mastered total discipline within. To see a red glow in the shadows would deem one's certain death.
Rebelling against his heritage as a blacksmith in his younger days, it'd take a lot more than strong wits to gain this man's allegiance.
Creating his own path as a blacksmith, he has come to acknowledge the raw strength that others possess.
He soon came to be known as the God Arm, though this power he only showed to those he deemed worthy.
Smith Lord, people called him. For he forged an almighty weapon to fight against the gods' invasion.
A pirate as brutal as she is beautiful. Many have tried, and failed, to thaw her impenetrable icy heart...
Her ferocity and coldness of character are notorious throughout the seas. Rumor has it that even the Sea King was unable to dent her frosty exterior.
Her attacks and insults freeze the hearts of both enemies and allies alike. Captain of a huge fleet of pirate ships, she has no time for any but the strongest of individuals.
Frost forms on the ground she treads, fierce gales and icy blizzards tear through her foes. Her frozen wrath challenging the gods.
A boxer who set out on an epic journey to discover her origins. Her fists make mincemeat out of any who dare to approach her.
She has sworn to continue traveling until she finds the answers she’s looking for. A world of hurt awaits any who stand in her way.
None exist who haven’t heard of this true brawling legend. She respects only those who understand the true meaning of destruction.
A martial artist at her very peak, a master of brute destruction. Pride is her only weakness.
A fighter who seeks great power to protect the one he loves. He pays attention only to those who exude the kind of power he desires.
A fighter who travels the world in search of the one he loves. The encounters and experiences he absorbs along the way add to his burgeoning strength.
A fighter with a kick powerful enough to crush even gods. Known as "Thunder Kick," he only has time for those who he thinks demonstrate enough power themselves.
A fighter who has honed his abilities beyond godlike, every smiting kick he delivers smashes with lightning electrocution.
Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!
The Six Sibyl Sisters were said to have rescued many people. Here lays a shrine dedicated to one of them. Why was it they reached out to save the people?
The Blaze Sibyl saved the people with an affectionate heart of mercy. However, that in turn led to her fighting her sisters. The sadness from that fight still lingers.
The ice cold air pricks at your skin, but what awaits ahead is a sibyl said to have a glacial glare even colder than ice.
A blade of ice that shines clear and bright thanks to the blood of the people it has fed on. Perhaps this is a symbol of her true pure nature.
The land that was once covered with beautiful blossoming flowers now exists as a dark, cold place, just like the memories of the young Rose Sibyl.
The young Rose Sibyl was best known for her sweet childlike smile. But do not underestimate her, for pure innocence and pure ruthlessness are two sides of the same coin.
The sisters once chatted joyfully in the land of thunder. Now, not a trace of their happiness can be found.
Do these bolts of lightning represent the rage of a sibyl of destruction, or are they her tears, shed over the battle with her sisters? The truth will never be known.
This sparkling shrine was once the pride of the Six Sisters. Now, without a master, rampant monsters lurk in alongside the souls of the sibyls of destruction.
The sibyl who had the kindness and mercy to forgive all sins, yet she couldn't save those closest to her. What might she reveal to a Summoner able to capture her?
The shrine sparkles like a star scattered sky. Just like the night sky it is breathtaking yet terrifying, awakening one's primal fear of the dark.
She was too engrossed in pursuing her ideals which is why she couldn't forgive anything. Regardless the passage of time, this never changed.
Entry to the Mysterious Paradise is only granted once a day. Croaking voices can be heard echoing in the distance.
Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices, something can be seen sparkling from inside.
This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside...
You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with...
Imps which can improve the abilities of those they are fused with. Don't miss your chance to travel to the land where these little ones gather!
A knight who once led a refugee escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. What could he be thinking now that he has shown himself once again?
The sword that once protected people during the war with the gods is now pointed in your direction. And with it, stern eyes that seem to test you.
A martial artist from the Toltya Dojo that protected those headed to Elgaia. Having regained his many secret techniques, now he stands in your way.
The secret techniques of the Toltya Dojo defeated countless gods during the great escape. This master's eyes look towards the future, ready to battle.
The youngster who planned the escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. Once he makes use of his brilliant intellect once again, how will it affect this era?
The eyes of the youngster who used his intellect to help his dear friends now stare at you silently. A strong will lies deep within them.
A young magician who guided the people after receiving a divine revelation from the gods. Could the will of the gods have brought her back as well?
The childhood friends that once fought by her side are no longer present. And yet she looks forward, believing in the dawn of a new era.
A heavily armored knight who saved many people during the escape to Elgaia. The white armor that once protected many now obstructs your path.
A strong soul that aided those who led the escape to Elgaia. One to look towards the future, his past remains a mystery. What path will he show you?
A knight from the Bariura Empire who defied the emperor and led his people to Elgaia. Bearing great pride, his soul has descended to Elgaia once more.
Though you seek peace for Grand Gaia, the ire he once held during the duel with his knight companion over their plan of escape is now directed at you!
A curious stage has been found deep within ancient ruins. And with it, a young songstress singing atop it. What could her message to the Summoners be?
A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. Her angelic voice continues to charm all Summoners. However, a certain one among them would change her...
A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. With a voice that once charmed the gods themselves, its sound makes humans forget the passage of time.
A strange airship shaped like a dragon suddenly appeared over the skies of Grand Gaia. Apparently, an otherworldly warrior of fire rides inside it.
The otherworldly warrior riding the airship wields a very particular sword. In fact, it is rumored that the blade has a will of its own.
Aboard the airship, the otherworldly warrior has combined his swordsmanship with the power of fire to create the ultimate attack. Best steer clear.
A temple said to be the center of a certain religious group. There, a lively female warrior seeks the precious otherworldly objects known as "Lenses."
The otherworldly warrioress in the depths of the temple is obsessed with money, and rumors say that she takes all visiting Summoners' possessions.
No Summoner can handle this greedy and otherworldly warrioress. She toys with them using her skills with the sword and powers from another world.
In an otherworldly city where Blastia is studied in research facilities, a girl immerses herself in her work. Some say she's quite strange...
Although the girl is usually cool and collected, she lost control of herself when a particular Summoner asked about the Blastia she studies.
The genius girl from the Blastia research facility is an elite mage who can draw her battle tactics to life, and use them against her opponents.
In an otherworldly city where magical devices are studied, a girl immerses herself in her research. Some say she's quite strange...
A girl has been spotted in the forest. Witnesses claim she wears her long pink hair in a ponytail.
The girl who had been spotted in the forest was seen once again. This time, witnesses claim she was riding a flying broom across the sky.
Deep within the forest, a girl with the knowledge of many types of magic is said to lurk. Rumor has it she even knows forbidden spells.
A mysterious swordsman has been roaming the Valhalla Plains. Some say he came from another world, and that he uses unique skills never seen before.
A mysterious swordsman has been frequenting the Valhalla Plains. He is said to shock his foes not only with his skills, but also with his decorum.
The enigmatic swordsman wandering the Valhalla Plains is said to be in search of the evil people who attacked his home and killed his parents.
A young lady was seen in an otherworldly research facility. She has dubbed herself the Lord of Spirits, and seeks to protect both humans and spirits.
A young lady was spotted in an otherworldly research facility. Not only is she skilled with the sword, but apparently she can also manipulate spirits.
The young lady seen at the otherworldly research facility is said to be a formidable warrior and sorceress. However, she dreads any loss of life.
In a meadow in another world, the Summoner runs into a young woman who is looking for someone. Suddenly, however, a person identical to her attacks.
The young woman claims to have lost her memory. The only things she seems to remember clearly are her abilities in battle, and her intended purpose.
The two identical women draw their swords at each other. Their mission: to destroy copies of themselves according to the Culling code of their world.
As you become lost in a strange forest, eerie silence surrounds you. The moment you hear a noise in the bushes, a girl jumps straight at you.
The girl resembles a wildcat and her movements are incredibly fast. The minute she sees an opening, she may just trick you by sneaking in from behind.
She is half-human, half Sea Breeze Tribe. The reason why her pranks don't stop even in the heat of battle, is because she's found beloved friends.
As you come across a beautiful castle, an intimidating air overcomes you. Before you awaits the warrioress dubbed the "Holy Knight of Glamour."
The gallant and dazzling knight seems to grow even brighter with each battle. Her mere presence encourages her men, who also come after you.
The knight smiles without a hint of hesitation. Proud of her soldiers, who gave their all in battle, she attacks one last time seeking victory.
An Elgaian martial artist who served during the foundation of Akras Summoners' Hall. Even in death, his soul seeks worthy opponents to battle.
The martial artist only ever truly felt alive during a battle. He still longs to feel the thrill of a duel with another demon.
Long ago, the Elgaia Federation formed a secret Ishgria Expeditionary Force with convicts. What sort of officer could lead this unlikely team?
Betrayed by the Federation and abandoned in a demon-ravaged land, the souls of the Ishgria Expeditionary Force wander even now...
A brilliant Federation researcher obsessed with otherworldly technology. Could it be the master's own mad spirit that inhabits his precious automaton?
It's said that his beloved automaton was further augmented to battle against demons. Its crazed spirit still seeks new targets to destroy.
A tribe of tenacious hunters once lived on Elgaia's frontier. When tragedy struck, only one lived on to avenge their catastrophic downfall.
After taking revenge, the lone hunter wanted no more than to return to his people's traditions of living and dying by the hunt of powerful fiends.
This Elgaian priestess was a devout believer of the Sealed God Lucius. In her mind, justice was found only in the teachings of her infallible god.
Betrayed, only one purpose remained to her: "Destroy the enemies of our god." Even in death, could her spirit ever find peace?
A spy from the Randall Empire had infiltrated the Elgaia Federation. He fought alone to discover the truth behind the Ishgria Expedition.
With no way to return home, he continued his investigation. Even now, his soul seeks a path home, to give his final report.
You've crossed the Vortex gate and find yourself in a luxurious room. You proceed with caution, though you seem to always end up in the same place...
You keep wandering inside the lavish palace. Its internal structure seems improbable, and you begin noticing that you can't really move forth.
Walking around the extravagant palace, you come across a terrible presence in its depths. Chills run through you as a giant door stands before you.
You take in the strange scenery before you. Overwhelmed by the divine atmosphere of the place, you watch as a so-called angel begins his descent.
While enjoying the magnificent atmosphere of the place, you see countless angels floating above you. Their beautiful formation moves you.
The otherworldly beings in the room are immersed in keeping their order, which makes you want to do the same. Make sure not to lose yourself as well.
You stand before a temple of curious design. Not only is its appearance overbearing, but it also exudes an intense air of benevolence.
Inside the temple, a multitude of candles flicker in the darkness. You proceed with extreme caution atop the red carpet sprawled on the floor.
You hear haunting voices chanting from afar. Their amalgamation strikes a cord deep within you.
A Quest designed by Mr. Just Nojima, head of Famitsu App's Brave Frontier. Knowing his usual gimmicks is the key to clearing this dungeon!
A challenging Quest designed by Mr. Misasagi, a legitimate Brave Frontier player. Could an experienced player make for a good developer as well?!
A mystical hidden Quest to celebrate our 3rd Anniversary. It is rumored that only the bravest of Summoners are able to clear it...
You can see the great Royal Capital before you after crossing the gate. As you approach it with care, a huge arena catches your eye.
A blonde young man awaits in the otherworldly arena of the Royal Capital smiling fearlessly as he unsheathes his blade. Challenges seem to please him.
The many marks around the arena suggest men and beasts have fought here before. How many battles to the death has this place seen on a regular basis?
You see a great arena before you past the gate to another world. A young man with flowing long black hair awaits with sword in hand.
Amidst all the commotion in this new world, you meet a young man with black hair that excels in swordsmanship. There is nowhere to run now.
The deep claw marks and gashes left upon the structure of the arena are a testament of the vicious battles that continuously take place here.
Swallowed by the vortex, the Summoner lands in a wasteland world. A Suddenly, a swarm of outlaws begin surrounding the area...
One man stands among the swarm exuding an air of wildness, and roaring loudly. "The 300,000 World Dollars on your head...they're mine."
"Tsch, looks like I've been played" he said, as if he'd been fooled by someone. "Don't worry, I'll pay every hit of yours back with some of my own."
Beyond the Vortex lay a luxurious court. Knights rush forward to kill the Summoner, as the punishment is death for those who dare attempt regicide.
The young king appears with a sword covered in lightning. He says "It is the sword that asks what lies within a warrior's breast," and a fight erupts.
There are things that can only be told through a duel to the death. One's position, one's feelings. And thus, their swords clashed in "danger time."
A celebration full of heroes from all over the world that's just begun! As they talk amongst themselves, could they be sending us a message too...?
You can only enter the Garden of Elgifs once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
Fire Hero Vargas vol. 1 - Vargas, in his younger days. It wasn't long before the proud title he built for himself crumbled before him.
Fire Hero Vargas vol. 2 - The days he ventured in search of strength. His countless fierce battles gave birth to the "Hero of the Fierce Flame."
Fire Hero Vargas vol. 3 - The violent battle with the gods. Fighting alongside his comrades as well as rivals, this is where the fire hero's legend began.
Ice Hero Selena vol. 1 - Continuing to reject taking on the responsibility of head of the Savat people, she ventures out to slay monsters.
Ice Hero Selena vol. 2 - Upon inheriting the treasured sword Lexida as proof of her leadership, Selena ventures to many lands under her new title.
Ice Hero Selena vol. 3 - As the gods begin their attack, the people unite as one, and the legend of the Ice Goddess begins.
Earth Hero Lance vol. 1 - Lance and his demon pike. Continuing his fateful journey, many a powerful foe appeared before him.
Earth Hero Lance vol. 2 - Led by his demon pike, Lance headed for the World Tree. However, something was waiting for him there.
Earth Hero Lance vol. 3 - The gods' invasion had at last begun. Inspired by the demon pike, this is where the earth hero's legend began.
Thunder Hero Eze vol. 1 - Eze, in his younger days as a demon bounty hunter. Experience the fateful meeting that changed his life forever.
Thunder Hero Eze vol. 2 - Aware of his own weaknesses, he immerses himself in training. That is when he finds his partner for life.
Thunder Hero Eze vol. 3 - In the violent battle with the gods, he almost loses what matters to him most. Watch, as he unlocks his true power!
Light Hero Atro vol. 1 - After driving a bandit away with a tree branch, Atro's hidden talent leads him to begin training in La Veda fencing.
Light Hero Atro vol. 2 - After acquiring the legendary sword of light, Urias, Atro becomes a master swordsman. However, many people begin appearing...
Light Hero Atro vol. 3 - The invasion of the gods has begun. Though in pain, Atro fights against the God Army for the people and is struck by tragedy.
Dark Hero Magress vol. 1 - Magress, a knight of the Bariura Empire trains arduously every day in hopes of meeting the emperor's expectations.
Dark Hero Magress vol. 2 - After his family's murder, an angry Magress spends his days in battle fueling the fire of vengeance within.
Dark Hero Magress vol. 3 - Eliminating all enemies from his path the ever angry and resentful Magress has finally attained the power of the gods!
4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 1 - After receiving a revelation, Edea sets off on a journey to search for allies to help repel the gods' attack on Palmyna.
4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 2 - The warriors head towards their decisive battle against Cardes! They must save Palmyna from the gods' invasion!
4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 3 - The price paid to seal Cardes was a great one. All the heroes come to gather around a dormant Edea.
Sefia - Foes manifesting from another world are invading Elgaia. She will exert divine justice upon them with her eight sacred blades!
Kikuri - A young woman from another world. She means to redecorate the new stage of Grand Gaia by dying it crimson as she dances!
Sefia & Kikuri (Continue Unavailable) - Red flowers are bound to bloom on the battlefield when these two opposing forces work together!
Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 1 - A white presence suddenly appears, destroying all in its path. Elsewhere, a suspicious dark presence awakens as well.
Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 2 - Michele and Crabby set off on a journey to face the Ten Winged Destroyer, making some strange friends along the way.
Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 3 - Michele's dear friends are defeated by Melchio's unbelievable power. That's when she...
Disastrous Beast vol. 1 - A girl born of two races never meant to be together looks for a fight alongside the enchanted doll her father left her.
Disastrous Beast vol. 2 - An angel meets a beast and confronts the will hiding deep within her heart. Her desire for freedom has been liberated.
Disastrous Beast vol. 3 - A group that fights against the gods with their own hopes in mind. They had been hidden from them before, but no longer.
12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 1 - Before Sodis's rebellion, Farlon takes his fellow Guardians on many different missions.
12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 2 - Sodis's younger brother, Alyut, joins the Guardians. His talents begin to blossom with the support of his comrades.
12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 3 - The Guardians face off against the demon Zorbadel. They must overcome this menace by working together!
12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 4 - A mission calls for the execution of the traitor Sodis, but each of the Guardians begins to follow their own path.
12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 5 - Luly becomes the catalyst for the fight between Alyut's forces and Sodis's supporters.
12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 6 - The final battle of the 12 Guardians draws near. They haven't even stopped to consider each other's feelings...
12 Guardians of the Gods (Extra) - Years pass since the Guardians' last battle. The only two survivors foresee the war between mankind and the gods.
Leaders of the Escape Vol. 1 - After the defeat of the Six Heroes, all regions fall into chaos. Leaders must step up to guide the people anew.
Leaders of the Escape Vol. 2 - As the people try to flee, Reed and Eru butt heads with each other. The promised land is almost at their reach, but...
Cursed Fire Armor vol. 1 - A scientist with her creation, and a twin sword wielding knight are after the demon Vishra and his cursed existence.
Cursed Fire Armor vol. 2 - A fierce battle erupts when those after the demon Vishra finally meet their target.
Cursed Fire Armor vol. 3 - The fight against Vishra begins changing everyone individually, including Vishra himself...
Cursed Fire Armor (Extra) - Logan regains his senses after his friend sacrifices his life for him. However, what awaits Reeze and Lilith henceforth?
Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 1 - The great gods known as the Divine Ten once had powerful disciples who would eventually turn against them.
Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 2 - The disciples of the Divine Ten draw their weapons against their masters. They all have their reasons for fighting.
Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 3 - The Six Pillars are sealed in to pay for their betrayal. The one who survives this will be granted freedom, but...
The Princess & the Knight vol. 1 -  Priscilla and Arus chase after a rampaging ancient dragon. However, a demon seems to lie behind it all...
The Princess & the Knight vol. 2 - Shera and Belfura join Priscilla and Arus to confront the ancient dragon once again.
The Princess & the Knight vol. 3 - Priscilla and Arus land in another world. The demon who had plotted it all finally reveals his existence to them.
Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 1 - The Oracle Knight lives to serve the god Lucius. Amongst the many to bear that title, one went by the name of Ark...
Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 2 - The Oracle Knight and the Oracle Maiden follow Lucius's orders and head towards the Holy Emperor with their comrades.
Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 3 - The final battle between the Oracle Knight's Troop and Karna Masta, the god who seeks to destroy humanity, begins now!
After having lost his memory in battle, Avant comes across a blade of flames. What awaits him after having overcome the loss of his son?
The Noble Thief Zelnite's story has yet to be told... Follow our mysterious hero as he uncovers the sinister plot of the Bariura Empire!
A Master's Wisdom vol. 1 - Mythic Kulyuk treats all living things equally. Many races have gathered around him as disciples...
A Master's Wisdom vol. 2 - Kulyuk sets out to meet the Holy Emperor, but this is just the beginning of the tragedy for him and his followers...
A Master's Wisdom vol. 3 - Kulyuk's disciples spring into action, each acting on their own beliefs, but an even harsher fate awaits them...
A Master's Wisdom vol. 4 - Kulyuk vanished suddenly after being called by the Holy Emperor. What could have happened to him?
Heroes of a New Era vol. 1 - Humanity has found hope in the new land of Elgaia. However, a threat quickly approaches!
Heroes of a New Era vol. 2 - The Randall Guard has finally been formed, but its members seem rather peculiar...
Heroes of a New Era vol. 3 - A demon suddenly appears in the city to test the Randall Guard. Are they truly worthy of being called heroes?
Blue Blooded Truth vol.1 - Princess Mariela possesses special powers and predicts that otherworldly demons will come for her in an invasion...
Blue Blooded Truth vol.2 - As the head of the dragon clan's new wife, Mariela gained a child, but that gives rise to a new tragedy...
Blue Blooded Truth vol.3 - Desires violently collide as Lyonesse seeks to protect the child of the dragon clan's chief from Sonia and Serge.
Blue Blooded Truth vol.4 - Times passes, and Karl arrives in the land of Ishgria as a Summoner. There he encounters a certain dragon clan warrior...
A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Crush every enemy you encounter to increase your innermost potential!
A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Defeat incoming enemies to see your innermost potential soar!
A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Defeat all foes standing in your way and develop your battle strength!
A special battle simulator designed to hone the Summoning Arts. Defeat all foes in your way to grow more proficient!
A special battle simulator designed to hone the Summoning Arts. Exterminate all foes heading towards you to hone your techniques!
A battle simulator designed to hone your Summoning skills. Defeat all foes standing in your way to hone your techniques!
A special battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Vanquish all incoming enemies to develop your skills!
A special battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Destroy any enemies on the field to test your weapons' limits!
A battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Defeat all foes standing in your way and seize further power!
A special battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Destroy all foes before you and allow your true talents to shine!
A special battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Crush all foes after you and watch yourself grow in the process!
A battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Defeat all foes standing in your way and go beyond your own limits!
Here you will face a monster from Raid Battle. Rumor has it Noel is behind its enhanced power...
A fight against an Elder Summoner who has watched over you since the very beginning. It would seem he wants to test how far you have come.
A battle with a demon that has thrown itself into an endless whirlwind of war. Keep elements in mind as you fight or victory will elude you.
Behold the divine creatures summoned to seal an incredible power. They will be the judges of your true abilities as a Summoner.

The strange musician and the girl who listened to him.
It seems their songs are helping the tree to grow.

The tree grows as if it was being fed by the instruments.
Could its branches reach to where the girl came from?
A light shines on the stairs within a closed room. What truth awaits the amnesiac girl who is slowly recovering her memory...?
The moon shines beautifully in the night as you feel a strange sort of magic about you. Two beings wrapped in cherry blossoms await you atop a bridge.
The two seemingly possessed beings continue to battle under the blooming evening blossoms. Could their iron will be hiding something more within?
As the battle rages on, the two beings' ornate garments turn as red as the evening blossoms. A hint of innocence can be seen behind their gloomy eyes.

A mysterious area that suddenly appeared in the Vortex.
On orders from the Akras Summoners’ Hall, hunters are being sent to investigate the area and rid it of monsters.

A mysterious area that suddenly appeared in the Vortex.
On orders from the Akras Summoners' Hall, hunters are being sent to investigate the area and rid it of monsters.
You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…
You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.
You're at the entrance to the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The beasts here are somewhat weak, but nevertheless you mustn't be careless.
You're at the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The air shakes as an awesome force descends upon you.
You're at the entrance to the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The beasts here are somewhat weak, but you mustn't be careless.
You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what awaits you in this uncharted frontier...
You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Beasts far more powerful than those you've encountered await you.
An area that can only be entered with special Units prepared by the Survey Office. What could be the powerful beings awaiting in its depths...?
You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier...
You think you have what it takes to defeat my mock Units? You should be really familiar with your opponent this time! I wonder how long you'll last?
Hmm, you're better than I expected. However, if you think you can beat my next Unit, you're wrong! I doubt you'll even be able to survive the first blow!
These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!

I used entirely different materials to make
this new mock Unit, you know!
You'll get quite the surprise when
you start fighting against it.
Welcome to a special dungeon created in honor of Brave Frontier's 1 year anniversary. Tough enemies await you to help you remember the good 'ol days!
A system Noel created in order to help Summoners train themselves. Strong opponents will attack any challenger that steps before them.
A new training program to test your abilities. Find an opening to strike your opponents and break their impregnable defenses!
A trial program exclusive to Fire Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!
A trial program exclusive to Water Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here, your summoning skills will be tested.
A trial program exclusive to Earth Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!
A trial program exclusive to Thunder Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here, your summoning skills will be tested.
A trial program exclusive to Light Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here, your summoning skills will be tested.
A trial program exclusive to Dark Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!
A trial program exclusive to Units of 6-star rarity or below. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!
A short trial program to test attacks. All foes will self-destruct in 3 turns, so try to inflict as much damage as possible on them before they do!
This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!
A trial program exclusive to male Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!
A trial program exclusive to female Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!
A trial program made for Grand Gaia adventurers. Fight foe after foe until you reach the strongest opponent awaiting you!
A trial program made for Ishgria adventurers. Fight foe after foe until you reach the strongest opponent awaiting you!
A trial program where you fight to the end using only Thunder and Light type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!
A trial program where you fight to the end using only Fire and Dark type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!
A trial program where you fight to the end using only Water and Earth type Units. Test your limits under these demanding restrictions!
A training program that tests the number of Sparks before you defeat a specified foe. Test the limits of your Units' Spark ability!
A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!

Shortly after defeating Maxwell, one of the Four Fallen Gods, Karl suddenly appears to ask the Summoner's help in defeating a dragon.
Not only is this dragon quite strong, but it is said to flee the second it senses danger.
The Summoner and Karl plan a strategy to prevent the dragon from running away, when suddenly...

After the crisis in Cordelica, the Summoner and Karl run into Lugina, who has a special request from Summoners' Hall.
He says they are to survey a great forest where the treasure of an empress is hidden.
The Summoner and Lugina take different routes to reach the same forest, but end up running into each other on a third route where they spot Paris...

Not long after defeating Zevalhua, one of the Four Fallen gods, Karl and Seria show up to ask the Summoner for help in defeating Graham, the demon they have been after for so many years.
As the three of them reach the region Graham oversees, many of his sly traps lie in waiting unbeknownst to them.

After defeating Maxwell, the Summoner receives an urgent request from Akras Summoners' Hall. The Demon Algmos has been spotted and a squad has been sent to slay him, but Seria ignored orders and went to seek him out alone. The Hall wants you to bring her back safely.It seems Algmos's decimation of a squad Seria had led in the past started it all...

After facing Lucius, the Summoner receives a request from Elder Grahdens.He wants the Summoner to defeat the Demon Mashreed as a training exercise. However, Mashreed is not the only demon in the area, as there are many others in the mix.Grahdens is ready to wipe the floor with these demons, but it seems he has some particular expectations in mind.

Shortly after defeating Maxwell, one of the Four Fallen Gods, the Summoner receives a mission from Lin. She wants to use her mechanical tools to survey a territory that seems to be connected to Grand Gaia, and wants the Summoner to act as her bodyguard. Thus, the two leave together on their journey, unexpectedly running into many monsters along the way...

Having defeated Lucius, Paris takes a moment to herself in the Imperial Library when Noel appears. He says there is a place where she can find her true self, and thus she sets off on a journey there. While on her way, she runs into the Summoner who's in the area, though she decides to continue on her own. However, another sudden meeting turns the tables...

Moments after defeating the sealed god Lucius, Noel sends the Summoner on a mission along with Lugina. However, the demon they are after has the ability to reflect the souls of its opponents, unexpectedly drawing Lugina into a fierce battle with his doppelganger. Meanwhile, Karl is on a mission in the area under orders from Grahdens, but...

During the great war with the gods, Palmyna suffers an invasion from the troops led by Cardes the Malevolent. With the kingdom facing a terrible danger, Princess Edea dons the enchanted armor Lafdranya and sets off on a journey to meet companions Lorand, Loch, and Dean. Together they join the rest of the royal army and head towards the last battle.

After a fierce battle, Edea and her friends succeed in sealing Cardes away. However, the price paid to accomplish this was far too high, as Princess Edea has fallen into a deep slumber. Having been scattered in different directions by Edea's powers, her friends begin regrouping in order to save her. The three believe there is still hope.

Not long before the great war with the gods, a young lady from the La Veda Republic called Michele witnessed a strange dark object fall from the sky. After meeting Duel-GX and learning that it has come from another world chasing the winged armor "Melchio," which had been destroying neighboring towns, Michele begins her journey to destroy Melchio...

Not long after Maxwell's defeat, Noah and the Summoner decide to accept a new Raid mission. However, since Elise has taken the day off from her duties as the receptionist, she's not there. Owen then suddenly appears to report that a demon has appeared on the mountain where Elise and her friends are having a picnic. She must be saved as soon as possible...

Just before the great war with the gods, the Guardians of Meirith receive new orders. They travel to Ishgria in order to defeat the demon Ragruvord, who is attempting to invade Grand Gaia. However, before they can confront him, a messenger appears from the gods. They hear that someone is after Karna Masta, and are ordered to return to Grand Gaia immediately.

The 7 leaders of the Akras Summoners' Hall Demon Slayers--Griff, Iris, Kafka, Rhoa, Libera, Krantz, and Mirfah--head to the world of Ishgria to survey the land. However, they face an enormous demon soon after arriving. Their leader, Griff, goes after the demon alone. As acting commander, Krantz leads the rest to where the return gate should be, but...

It began not long after Maxwell was defeated... Sera had always been serious, but she had begun to make odd statements to herself while lost in thought. Lin happened to overhear her while passing by and became fixated on the changes in Sera. Lin soon reached a conclusion, then invited Elise and the Summoner to follow Sera after work one day...

In the closing days of the war between gods and humanity, Reed, Lucana, and Aneil attempted to save survivors. They led the people with them as they headed for Mistral, the site of the promised land. The group encountered Rhein, Eru, and Nevsky along the way, and together they managed to make it to where the promised land was just ahead. But Mistral was also home to a threatening presence...

During the final stages of the war against the gods, the Bariura Empire is surrounded by the God Army. As the capital crumbles before their eyes, Sirius and the first princess Selvia decide to act to protect the imperial family's legacy. However, their plan could result in national unrest, which drives Sirius to question whether he should go forth with it...
The relics of Athensphere have yielded interesting results. Noel’s thirst for knowledge has the summoner searching for a particular figure in the memory gear…
The tracks of the mysterious kidnapper have led Avani to Ostagoth, capital city of the Morokai. Just what do they have planned for Ezra?
The final journey into the heart of Fuindor begins. What foes will our intrepid heroes face?

Under Lucius's orders, Tilith, Karl, and Seria travel to another world to defeat a demon, but they're somehow unable to return. Grahdens believes this is connected to the demon which appeared right after they had crossed over, so he sends the Summoner, Lugina, and Paris after it. However, they unexpectedly run into three otherworldly beings on the way...

The Akras Summoners' Hall has been notified of the appearance of a great god-like presence from another world, so the Summoner and Grahdens head towards it. There they run into Karl and Seria, who are protecting people who fight for humanity in their home world amidst a  war among multitudes of gods. The Summoners must now help these girls get back home.

秘密結社鷹の爪団の吉田は、ブレフロを征服
すべく新たな作戦を提案する。その名は「ブ
レイブしまね大作戦」。それはレオナルド博
士が作ったしまね化装置を使ってグランガイ
アの一部をしまね化し、自分たちの前線基地
とするというものだった。異変を察知したリ
ムより報告を受けたグラデンスは、まずはカ
ルとセリアを探索に向かわせるのだが……。
A place where Summoners can train for battle by setting certain settings and conditions.
"I wanted to see you fight for real" says the man with the blunt weapon. "I'll give you this sword if you win. Is that motivation enough to fight?"
The enemy is knocked down in body, but not in spirit. The Summoner shudders in trepidation at the "heavy" explosion that wells forth from within.
A group of maidens barged in here and demanded to use my sacred lab to test each other's strength!! Get in there and appease them so I can return to my experiments!
It seems a strange creature from Paskua has come to Grand Gaia in search of something. What could it be after, and why?
Although it seemed as if Cotton was after Carrol, it was actually after the eggs she's been collecting. Will she just hand them over?
Carrol and Cotton face off in a battle for the mystical eggs. However, kindness is one of Carrol's most admirable traits...
You have arrived at the tower where the formidable monster is rumored to be dwelling. It's dark and the cold, still air sends a chill up your spine.

DO NOT ENTER!
Enter Frontier Rift via Randall Survey Office.
Please refer to our official channels for more information.
Noel has sent you to investigate an anomaly near Randall. Meanwhile, a fiery warrior can be seen in the distance...
As you explore the building, blood is thick in the air. Everyone around you seems to be fighting each other!  What is going on?
Death stalks the halls as you reach the center of this madness; the silence is overpowering. What insanity will you meet here?
Learn to harness the power of Fire and Thunder with a sparring match versus Mai and Benimaru! Are you ready for this?
Learn to harness the forces of Water and Earth with a sparring match against Kula and Terry! Are you going to be okay?
Learn to harness the energy of Light and Dark with a sparring match against Athena and Iori! Care to wager on your odds?
Time to put your skills on the line in a royal rumble fit for legends! Embrace the elements and let them guide you to victory!
You've been sent to check on the phenomena caused by newcomers from beyond the "Backyard." Are you ready for wild dragons and thunderstorms?
More newcomers have arrived, including a strange two-winged girl, and her blond companion. They claim to be looking for a friend in a wedding gown...
Two more deadly beauties have arrived. Is it heaven, or hell? Only one thing's for sure--your heart might just be Overdrived into an Instant Kill!
Turns out Elphelt was just looking for eternal love. It's a beautiful day for a wedding, and she looks lovely in her gown. Time to declare your love!
Time to take a drive on the wild side! Put that pedal to the metal--Crash Belt's here for some high-impact adventure!
Down the river you go! Gazolina's ready to make a splash--in style! Can you handle the heat?
Witness your final showdown with Natalame! Will you stand tall, or will you bite the desert dust? Ready! Steady! Go!
Fairy Tail wizards have appeared through an anomaly in the vortex. They seem to think you're with a "Dark Guild." What's going on?!
Be careful! Lucy and Erza have joined the battle, and it looks like they're siding with the others. When will this misunderstanding end?!
Seems like Fairy Tail isn't backing down from an offensive stance. You've got one shot to help them understand things, so make it count!
A disturbance has appeared in Ishgria--a mysterious door has opened to a Dark realm. What could be going on?
Near the gate, a shadowy figure appears. Who is he, and just what are his intentions?
The shadowy figure near the gate turns out to be Mard Geer, from the same world as Fairy Tail. Will your efforts be enough to stop him?
Battle monsters and gain treasures for evolving your units! To the brave go the spoils!
Many have delved deep into these halls and never returned. Can you handle the monsters within? Reap the rewards with every victory!
Can you succeed where others have failed? Gain vital items for empowering your units and show them who's boss!
Flickering lights dart through the murky fog above the path, struggling to escape from the darkness…
With the night as their escort, they strolled through the darkened land. Beware, those who would cross their path…
Within the dark forest, sweet laughter danced above the cries of despair…
After he sacrificed his luck and saved a child, Kitsu has been constantly on the run. He is so tired…
Linlin and Bjorn has been looking for Kitsu for a long time. Will they find him before he succumbs to fatigue?
Kitsu and Linlin are finally reunited! They have no time to catch up, though, as the fox, fairy and bear are quickly surrounded by Kitsu's pursuers.
You emerged from the gate onto an unexpectedly ordinary plain. Ordinary, aside from the sounds of battle and clashing swords.
The gate led you into the heart of a raging battle, and there is no time to do anything but fight the foes that turn to face you.
A powerful young knight, with blood stains matching his crimson hair, has mistaken you for the enemy. Defend yourself or be destroyed!
A powerful force has invaded Grand Gaia through the Vortex Gate. The Summoners' Hall has called upon you to investigate this "Veritas of the Dark."
The man called Veritas of the Dark is growing stronger! You must fight back until the reinforcements from Summoners' Hall reach you!
This is it! The combined effort of every hero is needed to defeat the enemy. With your help (and a little luck), victory will come soon enough!
Oh no! Snow Miku's lost her way! Good thing you're here to help, Summoner! But be careful not to hit her, okay? Aim only for the bad guys!
Great job, Summoner! Now all you have to do is escort our young guest to--wait, where is she going? What is that in the distance?!
Almost there, Summoner! It's time for the performance of a lifetime! Miku, take it away!
When she heard of the beautiful cherry blossoms in Grand Gaia, Senbonzakura Miku knew she had to see them for herself. Her journey's just begun...!
Meanwhile, a concert is already underway in a forgotten forest. Miku presses on and soon realizes she isn't the only singer in this bizarre world...
As the two singers' voices resonate in unison, the snow begins to make way for a new spring. Whose voice shall echo for all eternity?
Hello! Wow, what are these words? Ooh, that's pretty! Do you want to join my balloons, Summoner? Come on in!
Oooh, hi! Are you having fun? That's great, 'coz everyone's going to have a great time--even if they don't know it! So hop on in!
Look, it's me, Ellie! And just in time too! We're going to have a hoppening time together, I know it! See what I did there? Tee-hee!
Wait, what is that? It's the Mother of Frogs! And a big one too! Betcha can't get to it first! I'll race you to it!
Now that you've met the guardian of the tower, you start to feel less confident about this mission. What else lurks in the darkness?
So far so good, nothing you can't handle as of yet. But the spooky howls coming from the higher levels of the tower are something you can't ignore...
What's that?! A dark shadow just flashed past you. Or was it just your imagination? Stay alert, Summoner.
How many floors has it been? It's getting darker and the rain isn't stopping. Gleaming eyes are watching you from behind the shadows...
Watch out for the beasts and monsters, they haven't had a decent meal in ages... Let your guard down and you might not live to see the sun rise again.
Your breathing seems heavier than before. Are you getting tired from the climb, or is the guardian of the tower pushing you to your limits?
He is hot on your heels, catching you at every turn and landing. You need to hurry! The ominous aura filling the air is getting thicker by the minute.
You can't let him get in your way now! You've come so far, the truth waiting to be unraveled is just a reach away...
Our favorite friends are back for a new challenge! Are you down for it?
This time our favorite friends bring their own guards for the challenge!
What is going on? Nothing works against Grind Burny!
You've reached the top of the tower! Or...have you? It's too dark to see, but you can clearly sense a strong power beckoning in the darkness...
A piece of the ancient lands of Athensphere still drifts in the Vortex, burning in fire and smoke.
An endless destruction continues in the fiery lands, while a destructive weapon reaps chaos throughout the land.
Can anyone stop the fiery destruction once and for all, and restore what remains of the Athensphere?
Seeing how much chaos he and his friends can cause, Nice Burny leads them on a rampage to cause greater chaos to whiny summoners. KEKEKEKEKEKE!
As the seasons change, the winds of fate swoosh over the lands welcoming a brand new year.
Auspicious creatures come out to play, challenge and brawl.
The short lifespan of man is but a rush of aroma and color. Only those of ripest age can be said to have enjoyed the fruits of life.
A new dawn awaits the those who face the sun and allow the wings of destiny to carry them to greater heights.
There is nothing more worth fighting for than justice. She will not hesitate to launch her missiles at anything she deems unrighteous.
Wait... What the cursed knight has been fighting to guard wasn't the tower? What he was trying to protect was... Wh-What's that?!
As Leon's influence grew, he gathered a band of thieves who shared the same ideals as his own. Help the weak, and crush the strong. Steal from the rich to aid the poor.
Hero of the Agni Empire, Vargas' strength and blazing sword lit the flame in the people's hearts to believe that they had a chance against the gods.
Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields glow red from the emergence of Fire Bulbs, buzzed and excited.
Frustrated that they're always being picked on, Burny and friends set out on a rampage to create chaos. MWAHAHAHA!
When she is angered, only destruction awaits. Stand in her way and be prepared to get blown away.
It only took the monster a single strike to take down the knight you fought so hard against?! Are you sure you can take on the monster?

As the band grew stronger and larger, Leon now had an army that reaped through the regions stamping down on the corrupt rich and powerful, making himself their number one enemy within the Agni Empire.
His immense powers were feared even by the gods. Even long after he left the empire, he was remembered by its people as the legendary swordsman of Agni.
Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields turn humid from emergence of Water Bulbs, wet and soggy.
As night falls, the shine of the moon lights up the darkness, enticing curious creatures to come out to play.
Sparks fly as her war rockets blow her enemies away. Her passion for justice burns stronger than ever.
Now that Xenon is injured, you're the only one who can contain the monster. Hurry, before it escapes the tower!

As he finally claimed the territory of the ruined Agni Empire, Leon faced officials, angry gods, and Summoners charging up his doorstep. Believing in equality among men, the thief of justice faced all odds with his cunning and wits.
Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Earth Bulbs, lush and green.
As the moon reaches its fullest in the night sky, a mysterious gathering has begun. All manner of creatures are drawn to the beauty in the sky.
Oh no! You lost sight of the monster! Where is it? There's no time to waste... You need to track it down before it can ambush you!
Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Thunder Bulbs, flashing with electric rhythm.
Mesmerized and enthralled by the bright yet silent moon, curious creatures begin dancing to the mystical feeling in the air.
The darkness is putting you at a great disadvantage, but you can hear the monster's heartbeat from a distance. Wait, was that your own heartbeat instead?
Once a week, lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Light Bulbs, bright and luminous.
The continuous climb and seemingly endless battles have taken a toll on you, but your mission is not over. Xenon is pinning his hopes on you, Summoner.
Once a week, lunar shifts above affects the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields emanate a purple glow from the emergence of Dark Bulbs, morbid and desolate.
Is that the best you can do? You need to muster more energy and power to complete this mission! Pull yourself together and charge forth!
The monster seems to be getting stronger and stronger. Can you keep up? If you give up now, it's not going to leave a nice impression on your record...
There's no time to rest! The monster must be getting exhausted too, this is your chance to attack! Did you lose sight of it again?
It has been a long, tough fight. You're so close to completing your mission! You're not going to give up now, are you?
A sunken piece of Athensphere that although filled with treasure & valuable history, still houses many dangers. Only the brave dare to traverse into the unknown depths.
In the quiet waters of the depths, a ferocious carnage still rages. No one is safe when diving into this unknown territory.
Can the echoes of mayhem and despair of the deep be finally eradicated? Will the lost treasures and history of Athensphere be finally retrieved?
In the snowy outlands, something stirs the emotions of man and beasts alike.
The ice and snow glister with a soft mystic light from the sun. The glades seem a little unusual this year.
The harsh cold air gets stronger, the snow gets thicker. Your curious heart wanders deeper.
In a distant land, bright lights glimmer and melodious jingling fills the air.
A sudden snowstorm picks up as you trudge your way towards a nearby castle. Curiously, it seems to be nudging you forward.
As you approach the arctic castle, a shadowy figure watches over you from the top of one of its towers. What surprises await ahead?
In the shattered remains of Nick's workshop, two very different creatures come to life. What could be the story behind their magical awakening?
A wandering figure tries to make sense of a chaotic world while a lone sentinel continues to find corpses. Who will find who first?
After much searching, Silvie finally catches up with Nick. However, how will Haido's interruption affect the party's delicate situation?
Cool and dignified, she bows to no one but her trusty Gatling gun which she has entrusted her life to.
Xenon & Estia revisit their past of wandering the wilderness together, after escaping from their burning kingdom in search of allies to recruit...
Beautiful yet strong, Selena was admired by many for leading the Savat people of the Sama Kingdom to countless victorious battles.
Known as the Gun Lady, she never lets her guard or her gun down. When it comes to the quick draw, she is second to none.
In the following months after escaping the gods, they survived and adapted to danger, slowly forging a special relationship against all odds that lay before them.
Refusing the call from her kingdom, Selena instead wielded her treasured sword Lexida and cut down god after god to rescue the masses.
It's no longer a matter of winning or losing. She wants revenge and she wants it fast. She has no time for those who can't keep up.
Defeated but finally freed, the couple wonders if their bond is still as strong as it was in the past.
As Athensphere crumbles, its peaceful sanctums where the first demi-gods were once created plunge into chaos.
Will the holy relics of the past lying within the holy grounds be destroyed in the fire of destruction, or be salvaged by the brave?
As the skirmishes in the sanctuary carry on, a determined soul vows to rid the holy grounds of this invasive rampage.
She doesn't have the slightest clue about her past, but she knows one thing well and clear. She needs to get stronger.
Picking up the Sacred Pike Drevas, Lance gave up his roots as a noble of the Principality of Vriksha to pursue greater skill and power.
The mountains are more dangerous than they look, but nothing will stop her from sharpening her senses as well as her claws.
Lance stood up against the gods, but he was not alone. He had his awakened Demon Pike Drevas, which now held the powers of World Tree Altro.
"Never underestimate a cat," she always warns, and those who cross her only realize it when they feel her claws dig in.
The skies thunder with fury as the augmentation wars carry on through the forsaken lands of Athensphere.
The defense forces push forward upon the high grounds as Gazia and his iron army concentrate at the peak.
The final frontier looms ever closer as the defensive forces of Athensphere clash with the enemy in an electrified fury.
Being able to prophesize, the only way she could keep going despite the dreadful war was to smile and keep fighting.
Eze trained and fought hard as a  warrior and was rewarded with the Thunder Sword Batootha, which gave him the destructive power of thunder.
A storm has been brewing across the vast skies of Grand Gaia, and where there is a storm, thunder is bound to follow.
Though she lost her memory, she didn't lose her spark and will to fight, her grin only widened as she got stronger.
Eze tore down the gods with his Thunder Sword Batootha and his superior speed, rescuing Goddess Emilia and the masses during the great war.
Do you hear the thunder? It's coming for you. They're coming for you. Can you thrive above the lightning, or will you kneel to their bolts of power?
A fortune-teller knows that there's no way to change fate. The only way to win is to laugh and make merry. Fight-oh!
The melodies of Fire, Water and Light echo down the great halls of the infinite abyss.
The melodies of Earth, Thunder and Darkness echo down the great halls of the infinite abyss.
As the cries of war creep nearer, peace is broken, and the tranquillity of the lands is disturbed.
A battle breaks out on the Faithlorn Fields of Athensphere. Neither the old nor young shall be spared.
Gentle souls begin rising up in desperation to bring back order to the lands.
As the spring solstice approaches, furry creatures come out to play.
Furry creatures bear gifts and little surprises for travelers from distant lands.
Gifts and surprises don't come with ease, furry creatures live to tease.
Celebrate the joy of spring time with even more furry creatures than before!
While others struggle on the ground, she soars through the sky to wherever the light reaches, and fights for those who seek freedom.
Gifted with extraordinary skills, Atro was known as the "Sword Saint" for his brilliant technique with the legendary Light Sword Urias.
If death can't stop her, nothing will. As long as there is a ray of light, she'll trace it down, even to Gaia's end.
When the gods destroyed the monastery he grew up in, he drew his sword and unleashed the unearthly powers of Urias, going all out against the gods.
Stronger, higher, faster. Whoever said the sky's the limit obviously never met Vanila. To this airborne warrior, the sky is but the starting line.

I... I opened a portal to the Dark Tower and I couldn't control the accursed.
Keep it under control and you shall be rewarded.
This mock unit was supposedly widely feared and known far throughout the East. Are you up for the challenge?
I’ve finally done it!! My research has led me to this man of great importance. There is much I would like to ask him but first, would you like a challenge?
As Athensphere was torn apart and condemned into the abyss of the Vortex, an eternal conflict continues beneath the fissure it once stood upon.
Though there is much to salvage of the once mighty lands, a ferocious creation wreaks havoc and kills anyone who dares enter the domain.
From above the chasm, screams and growls of victims and demons echo on below. Can anyone step up and bring the destruction to an end?
Follow Fang into Xie'Jing's abyss to search for Fei in order to rescue him...
Can you help Fang defeat Xie'Jing once and for all, and snatch Fei out of her clutches?
A past adversary, a terrible memory. Will they be able to finally exorcise this vile foe?
A young girl searching for her parents meets a dashing male amidst the shadows. Is this what they call fate?
The darkest hour is just before the dawn. To be able to see the light, one must face their darkest demons!
The half-demon daughter of a dark lord is always seeking a thrill by feeding her restless blood. Battle Maidens? Sounds like fun.
As a cavalry leader's son, Magress was a talented young knight. Triggered by his defeat to his father, he honed his skills and soon became the strongest in Bariura.
Nothing bores her more than incompetent, weak fighters. The demon in her is telling her to fight to survive, and devour to succeed.
Wielding a gigantic lance, he could effortlessly pierce through the thickest of armor. Even the gods couldn't stand in his way.
She doesn't care if a human, god, or demon stands in her way. Her demon blade will only stop for someone who excites her...but only for brief while.
The gods thus granted this spirit with the burning desire to triumph in battle, making it the strongest of its kind.
The lands begin to darken, covered in shadows. A mysterious aura draws the curious and the timid alike.
An ancient destructive force reanimated and energized to its very limit.
Evil descends into the darkened lands, haunting the timid and assaulting the unwary.
The gods gave this demon the spirit of ultimate defense, strengthened its power, and sharpened its claws.
The lands fall into what seem like an eternal nightfall. From the twilight, demons and monsters emerge...
It was rumored that the beast acquired the mysterious power of a fiery barrier.
Are you ready to face your fears and conquer the hellborn itself? Assist Ciara & Semira in defeating it!
And the gods said to her, all you need to do is get even angrier.
Demonspawn have come out to play! Free Ciara & Semira from their control, if they are even the real deal that is?
The gods granted a powerful companion to the most unlikely of all creatures..
Behold the path of a story never told before - of a fallen knight, and his black return! Who will you face - Ciara, or her nemesis?
As you investigate a magical laboratory, you feel a burning gaze on you. Behind you appears a mysterious figure out of thin air.
The experienced and beautiful lady of the mage's guild is both dominant and seasoned. She attacks you as if teasing you, testing your capabilities.
The mage laughs of someone who holds many secrets. Knowing there are more yet to be found, she prepares a unique spell for this special occasion.
Legend has it that there was once a knight who came into his own kingdom. He would name it after a mythical land from tales of old...
Arthur devoted his life to protecting NeoAvalon, but lost everything he held dear in the process. Will he continue to walk the path of the righteous?
Not even kings may escape the cruelty of fate. Lost in the darkness of his own fury, Arthur crosses blades with a traveling soldier named Lancelot.
Having tested each other's strength, the two warriors join forces to hunt down a mysterious and powerful artifact. Will their alliance last?
You can only enter Spring Paradise once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets...
No one knows what Noel does in his lab. Thus, one feels no surprise when told that an infectous virus threatens to turn into a full outbreak.
Just what is this virus made of? Even inorganic constructs fall prey to it.
The mercenaries have prepared well for invasions. Be ready for the enemy to strike first and counter them with style!
Using his machines and dark rites, Merlin is attempting to bring back something, or someone, to his world... He had better not be disturbed!
test
A strange eclipse, an unfamiliar silhouette. He who holds the key has tapped into a long lost power, a hypnotic force that is spread across Grand Gaia.
Dark and light, good and evil... Can you maintain balance, or will you give in to the Keymaster's magic? The force of the eclipse is growing...
The darkness has lightened. The exit should be close, but there's tension in the air. Surely, the sime of a formidable foe.
As expected, Maxwell has filled his base with incredibly powerful beings. Liberating them is going to be difficult.
You can feel the fallen god's presence grow stronger as you proceed. However, surely he has set up a powerful defensive line before him.
Continuing through the mines, you occasionally here the sound of thunder. Whether it's natural or the roar of some thunder beast, surely you'll find out soon.
You must get out of here quickly
You're close enough to the tower that you have to look up to see where it ends. It's odd appearance causes a lump in your throat.
Could this path also be part of the ruins? The moss covered path and crumbling statues show the passage of time. Still, this is no time to relax.
Is Karl all right? Just as Tilith said, there must be a reason why Karl is being kept alive, so his life shouldn't be in danger, but still…
There's a faint aroma of sea breeze in the moist air. This change can only mean that the end of the Wetlands is near.
It's battle after battle, but while caught up in them you feel a new, yet strange power approaching. It feels familiar somehow though...
A bright light shines over the great metropolis. Its size and structure rival those of Randall. However, oddly enough, no one seems to live here.
The youngster who planned the escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. Once she makes use of her brilliant intellect once again, how will it affect this era?
The eyes of the youngster who used her intellect to help her dear friends now stare at you silently. A strong will lies deep within them.
Swallowed by the vortex, the Summoner lands in a wasteland world. A Suddenly, a swarm of outlaws begin surrounding the area...
One man stands among the swarm exuding an air of wildness, and roaring loudly. "The 300,000 World Dollars on your head...they're mine."
Tsch, looks like I've been played he said, as if he'd been fooled by someone. "Don't worry, I'll pay every hit of yours back with some of my own."
Beyond the Vortex lay a luxurious court. Knights rush forward to kill the Summoner, as the punishment is death for those who dare attempt regicide.
Sefia & Kikuri - Red flowers are bound to bloom on the battlefield when these two opposing forces work together!
The Princess & the Knight vol. 1 - Priscilla and Arus chase after a rampaging ancient dragon. However, a demon seems to lie behind it all...
絶大なる神の力を封印するために召喚された封神儀たち。真の召喚の力を使いこなし、彼らにその力を認めさせるのだ。
What happens to all those Christmas trees after they've been disposed of? What do they become? What have they done with Santa?
It seems as though some of Santa's workers have turned on him. How could this have happened? Help Santa and restore the Christmas spirit!
The evil forces that have taken over Santa's Workshop have run amok. Take Santa back and save Christmas for the children of Grand Gaia.
People believe in a different Pantheon in the North. Such legend tells us about the 6 exceptional semi-goddesses who wield special powers. Do you dare meet them?
It is said that these semi-goddesses select fallen warriors to enter their heaven to fight side by side with the gods. What will your fate be? Only a select few will find out.
Skalmold has gone rogue. She has fled her role as the bringer of souls and bathes in attention from her suitors. Defeat her for a chance to unlock the secrets of the Pantheon
Skalmold's demise was thought to bring stability to the pantheon. There were, however, unintended consequences. Although unknown to most, Geirdriful was Skalmold's sister.
Overwhelmed by pain, Geirdriful ate her late sister's heart, unknowing as to how much this dark ritual would affect her brain and her powers...
Geirdriful is now striding the coldest lands of Grand Gaia, slaying anyone and anything that she encounters. Would you dare confronting her?
WARNING - DO NOT ENTER. NOT FOR THE FAINT OF HEART.
The only place for a frog to be.
RoboFrog: "Some people are eating my legs! Help me!"
A unique unit is hiding here. Capture him and find out yourself! What the croak?
A different world. Another dimension. Verdute, who we know as a Mad Tyrant here, is a hero in the Mirror World. Save etudreV from sagraV!
Would you dare journey through the Mirror World? The now tyrant, sagraV has enslaved his realm. Heroes whose names could be familiar to you are fighting him.
In lladnaR, the tyrant sagraV captured etudreV's soul in a Mirror. If you could defeat him, etudreV would be a great asset in our own world.
!!ksir nwo ruoy ta retnE !yznerF ni dlroW rorriM !gninraW
We are back in the Mirror World. sagraV is now throwing all he's got... He seems to have a secret weapon to try to win this war.
The war is on! Gather all the heroes from both worlds to try to defeat sagraV. A great danger is upon all of our worlds!
You need to journey back to the mirror World, sagraV captured tuanregguJ to modify it as the death bringer Juggernaut. We need you back, chosen ones!
The Portal that once led you to the northern territories and the mirror world just opened again... where will it lead us this time?
A strange world. A race of Shapeshifters use their powers to enslave all other races and call themselves the Noblesses.
A strange plot develops between the Noblesses. Men have been found beheaded. Who is the culprit?
You found the secret! Countess Jade of the Cruel Forest and The Crimson Fort has a bad habit of beheading her suitors... Maybe you could "suggest" her to stop.
Will you be able to find Wandering Jack?
You venture deeper and deeper into the forest... Menacing trees, smiling pumpkins...
A pumburkiny?! But where is Jack? Have you found any orange treats?
Jack’s back! He adopted a burny?!
A pumburkiny?! But where is Jack? Have you found any green treats?
The vortex opens in front of you. A new world, another time, a desolate future where it’s all about survival of the fittest.
This strange and anarchic future makes you restless. The area seems to be dominated by a close-knit and well-trained band of rogues, bent on looting the remaining resources.
The leader of this band seems to like you. They are soon going to launch their final raid against a city in the midst of the dunes.
Coal Cauldron Vs Bloody Blink.
The ruins of an ancient city. They seem to be haunted by strange creatures...
After penetrating deeper into the ruins, you sense infinite knowledge is buried here within.
Priscilla has got lost in Santa Claus’ mountains. Even worse yet, she’s lost Santa...
Yoohoo?! Santa? They went crazy. Capture them and bring them back to the log cabin.
Priscilla has got lost in Santa Claus’ mountains. Even worse yet! She’s lost Santa...
The Quest for the Grail has begun. The most gallant knights have gathered before Arthur and have left for all four corners of Grand Gaïa.
A mysterious knight seems to block the path. He says he’s waiting for Arthur, talks of destiny. A prophecy “The truth, revealed, fragmented and known to no one”.
There are surely some parts left for you to collect before Grand Gaia is brought into the light.
eno on ot nwonk dna detnemgarf ,delaever ,hturt ehT
...dne sti gnitaen si tseuq ruoY
You've arrived in Valhalla, a legendary haven for the souls of fallen warriors... The Corruption pervading Elgaia appears to emanate from here. An immense forest stand in front of you.
The forest gets more dense around you, radiating an abnormal sense of aggression. You’re not welcome here!
Penetrating into the midst of the forest, you feel a great power all around you. You know that a Valkyrie haunts these woods, but why would she try to fight you?
